title: 820-00281-A Critical Software Update failed to install
message:
Passes all Apple diagnostic tests. Geniuses said its a faulty TouchBar
Tried most of these - [URL='https://repair.wiki/w/A1706_2016-2017_13%E2%80%9D_Touchbar_MacBook_Pro']https://repair.wiki/w/A1706_2016-2017_13”_Touchbar_MacBook_Pro[/URL]
[LIST]
[*]Disconnected the Touchbar as it was showing only yellowish background
[*]Wiped the drive and reinstalled High Sierra - It installed properly, but on the next restart this error comes again
[*]Boot in Safe mode and tried to update from there. Takes a very long time to load into. Even the screen refreshes on lines. On the next restart went to the same screen
[*]Disconnected LCD and tried on external to update, same error.
[*]No visible corrosion around  PP1V8_Sleep3_Buck3 = 1.79v
[/LIST]
Any other suggestions?

title: 820-00281-A Critical Software Update failed to install
message:
"Tried most of these"
You didn't mention if tried known good touchbar.

Check all resistors around U3900/10.
PMU_TO_SOC_RESET_L goes high?

title: 820-00281-A Critical Software Update failed to install
820-00281-A Critical Software Update failed to install
message:
PMU_TO_SOC_RESET_L  Goes 1.79V when it turns on

Tried another touchbar, stuck at the same message, however no light on the brand new and used touchbar with a case. Suspecting something touchbar related on the board?

Resistors seems fine. Slight oxidation around underfilled SSD chips shield and test points. But nothing major, cleaned still same. Loads under Linux and Windows with touchbar disconnected,

title: 820-00281-A Critical Software Update failed to install
message: So you've tested its touchbar with other MLB?

title: 820-00281-A Critical Software Update failed to install
message: dont have spare A1770 for test, but have spare palmrest with functioning touchbar, as well as brand new touchbars

title: 820-00281-A Critical Software Update failed to install
message:
Got a spare A1707, placed this board into spare casing and same error message.
Placed working A1707 in this one's case and touchbar and everything else is working.

Any areas I should cross-compare measurements of while I have them both here? u3900 is shielded but will take measurements of the surroundings

title: 820-00281-A Critical Software Update failed to install
message: You could try and reflow U4200. I've fixed a few of these just by doing that.

title: 820-00281-A Critical Software Update failed to install
message: [USER=7922]@tcampbell34[/USER] Have you come across a crashed software update issue? It must have overheated and cold jointed then. Thanks for this I will try.

title: 820-00281-A Critical Software Update failed to install
message: Compare voltages on J4401/02 between both boards; touchbar connected, of course.

title: 820-00281-A Critical Software Update failed to install
message:
[ATTACH type="full" alt="1651563669998.png"]60604[/ATTACH]

Managed to measure these, but cant the rest, impossible without ripping the trackpad cables. This board also doesnt turn on without a battery.

J4401 Diode mode reading between two boards are identical on J4401

title: 820-00281-A Critical Software Update failed to install
message: You should search and find test points, or component terminals connected to the lines of the connector.
